detail_desc: Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fitted dress in rib-knit cotton containing glittery threads that is narrow at the top and has long, wide sleeves with narrow, ribbed cuffs.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a viscose weave with a high waist that has ties at the front and elastication at the back.
Tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Top in soft jersey with an interactive motif. Narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave with elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Wide cotton jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Linen-blend jacket in a herringbone weave with notch lapels, a covered button at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

Lined bikini top with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Small frill trim at the top, a decorative bow with metal pendants at the front, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets with a decorative flap and gently tapered legs with creases. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset, longer legs and laser-cut edges. Light shaping effect on the waist, bum and hips.
Body in soft jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Short skirt in a soft weave with pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, side pockets and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.
Shorts in stretch cotton corduroy with covered elastication at the waist, a decorative bow at the front and side pockets.

Triangle bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways and an adjustable metal hook fastening at the back.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hi-top canvas trainers with a lightly padded shaft, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wide shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, ties at the front and patch front pockets.
Oversized polo-neck jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool. 3/4-length sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits at the sides. Soft brushed inside.

Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a small stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Zipped sleeve pocket, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with an opening at the top with a tie detail at the neck and a seam down the front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and long raglan sleeves with grosgrain trims down the sides. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a collar, button placket and flap chest pockets. Seam with a drawstring and ties under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.
Knee-length coat in soft felted fabric with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams and a straight-cut hem. Lined.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave containing some wool with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Short, pattern-weave skirt with a high waist, detachable belt, concealed zip in one side and a sewn-in wrapover. Lined.
Sleeveless top in seersucker with frill-trimmed smocking at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a bow.
Trousers in cotton-blend slub jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, gently tapered legs, side pockets and ribbed hems. Regular fit.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, concealed button placket and rounded hem.

Padded parka in a cotton weave with a lined, detachable hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a single back vent. Lined.
Straight-cut blouse in a soft weave with a collar and concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Socks in a soft, fine-knit organic cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake back pocket, a low crotch and tapered legs with creases and a slit at the hems.
Shampoo and shower gel set with a fresh watermelon fragrance. 2x50 ml.
5-pocket relaxed-fit jeans in washed denim with a zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and straight legs that taper gently to the hems.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and a shorter top in airy fabric layered over the top.

Light-support sports bralette suitable for low-intensity workouts with a fast-drying function designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Wide shoulder straps, a racer back and lined cups with removable inserts for an adjustable fit and to shape the bust. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Oversized, V-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Low dropped shoulders and twisted seams and slits at the sides. Longer at the back.

Dress in lightweight cotton twill with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and flounces down the front that go over the shoulders and continue down the back. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with a button fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button.

Long dress in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with an embroidered pattern. Wide shoulder straps, a smocked section at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with tiers for added width and volume. Lined.
Metal earrings with a fabric tassel. Length 8 cm.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Cap in woven fabric with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft viscose jersey with long sleeves. Elastication around the top, cuffs and hem.
Round earrings with long pendants decorated with a large bead and a smaller cube. Length 10.5 cm.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, overlocked edges around the armholes and hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with motifs, a hood with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with narrow hems.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front.
Long-sleeved dress shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and pin-tucks at the front. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back of the neck.
Fully lined, 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and slim legs. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and small opening with ties at the front of the hem.
Dress in a crinkled weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short sleeves with a slit and ties. Calf-length at the back and shorter at the front. Unlined.

V-neck dress in a patterned viscose weave with covered buttons down the front, decorative gathers at the shoulders, short, elasticated puff sleeves with a tie at the cuffs, and high slits at the front and sides. Unlined.
Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups with removable inserts that lift and shape. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide fastening at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered motif on the front and an adjustable hook and loop fastener at the back. Sweatband in a cotton weave.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a padded top edge and lacing with speed hooks at the front. Satin linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Small hair elastics in various colours without metal clips.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Pull-on trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with gathers below the knees and a zip at the hems.
Cardigan in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Soft, padded slippers in fabric with a glow-in-the-dark print. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Sandals in imitation suede and imitation leather. Adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Short, straight-cut dress in an airy weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons at the top. Draped cap sleeves, covered elastication at the back, and sewn-in ties at the sides. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a frill-trimmed square neckline.
Straight-cut jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Fitted, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
